amendment.description: At the end of the bill (before the short title), insert the following newsection: SEC.___. None of the funds made available by this Act may be used for Government Travel Charge Card expenses by military or civilian personnel of the Department of Defense for gaming, or for entertainment that includes topless or nude entertainers or participants, as prohibited by Department of Defense FMR, Volume 9, Chapter 3 and Department of Defense Instruction 1015.10 (enclosure 3, 14a and 14b).
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit use of funds for Government Travel Charge Card expenses by military or civilian personnel of DOD for gaming, or entertainment that includes topless or nude entertainers or participants.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Gosar amendment (A056) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A056) offered by Mr. Gosar.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Gosar amendment (A056) Agreed to by voice vote.
